• RU
Watch the stories
What is it like to be an LGBTQ person? In short, not easy. Especially if you live in certain parts of the world.
A few people from different countries agreed to talk frankly about their life experience. We publish them here to give you a better idea of feelings, challenges, and choices that are common to people “born under the rainbow.”
Damien
Damien is an IT specialist born in a small town in Ukraine. Watch his story to learn how he managed to marry his partner and why he decided to proceed with his career in the US.
Kirill
Kirill grew up in the Russian city of Yekaterinburg, lived in Sochi, and ended up moving to Moscow. Watch his story to learn why he didn't take marriage seriously and how he changes his look as he meets with his mother.

BROTHER STORIES is a part of the BROTHER project.
Please support us - follow and share.
